extension.summary: We Fly High and NEVER Fall....
extension.description: The Legends Repo is made by 4 Ghosts all Add-ons are welcome BUT you must be the maker and NO clones we will help take your Add-on main dtream along side the Devs Mark Money and BlackDragon, To add your Add-on Email (Legends.Repo@gmail.com) Whith your Add-on we will check it out and add it if it makes the cut :)
